How to diagnose 17q23.1q23.2 microdeletion syndrome ?,How is 17q23.1q23.2 microdeletion syndrome diagnosed? The deletion can be identified by comparative genomic hybridization (CGH) microarray and fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH).,GARD,17q23.1q23.2 microdeletion syndrome
